snippet: The Federal Bureau of Investigation sent a bulletin to the Garland police three hours before the cartoon contest warning them that Elton Simpson, one of the men who carried out the attack, might show up at the event.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation discloses that it sent warning to police in Garland, Tex, that Ed Simpson might appear outside Prophet Muhammad cartoon contest; Simpson was one of two men who carried out attack on gathering.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Bureau of Investigation sent a bulletin to the Garland police three hours before the cartoon contest warning them that Elton Simpson, one of the men who carried out the attack, might show up at the event.

headline.main: F.B.I. Says It Sent Warning on One Gunman in Attack at Texas Gathering
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Says It Sent Warning on One Gunman in Attack at Texas Gathering

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
